title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document functional, non-functional, and security requirements for the MemoryEnhancer neural implant.

title: Design MemoryEnhancer Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the MemoryEnhancer neural implant considering hardware, software, and networking aspects.

title: Develop Memory Formation Algorithm
description: Design and implement the algorithm for improving memory formation in the neural implant.

title: Develop Recall Enhancement Algorithm
description: Design and implement the algorithm for improving memory recall in the neural implant.

title: Develop Download Interface for Information Transfer
description: Create an interface for downloading information directly to the brain.

title: Implement Security Mechanisms
description: Design and implement security mechanisms to protect the user's privacy and prevent unauthorized access.

title: Perform Unit and Integration Tests
description: Conduct unit tests and integration tests to ensure the system functions correctly.
dependencies: Develop Download Interface for Information Transfer

title: Deploy and Test Prototype
description: Prepare the MemoryEnhancer neural implant for deployment, test the prototype, and gather feedback.

title: Iterate on Design and Implement Changes Based on Feedback
description: Revise the MemoryEnhancer design based on user feedback and make necessary changes.
